text:
Premier League
Tottenham: The red card of Son canceled after his fault on Gomes
The English Disciplinary Commission found that the fault of the Korean Son over the Portuguese Everton Andre Gomes was unintentional. His red card is canceled
05 Nov 2019, 17:40 by Antoine Chirat



Tottenham: the possible eleven of the seasonMauricio Pochettino should not upset his squad in the coming season. The Argentinian put on stability.Icon Sport

Tottenham: the possible eleven of the season




The image has gone around the world. At the end of the second period of the duel between Everton and Tottenham, the Korean Spurs Heung-min His imbalance the Portuguese AndrÃ© Gomes who falls while taking at the same time his legs in that of Serge Aurier. Terrible balance sheet: fracture of the foot. After receiving a yellow card, referee Martin Atkinson finally revised his judgment to send him a red card. However, the disciplinary committee meeting today decided to cancel this sanction, the fault being according to them not voluntary.
